wikipedia_page.main: Richard Samuel Chattock   (23 August 1825 – 30 January 1906) was an English printmaker, painter and etcher.

response: The artist J. M. W. Turner sketched here in July 1816 for his Yorkshire Sketchbook. The noted 19th-century etching artist Richard Samuel Chattock is known to have created two works of Cotter Force in 1864. Both etchings now reside in The Fine Arts Museum of San Francisco.
*Richard Samuel Chattock (1825–1906), English painter and etcher
